title: Rental House Technician Interview
Interview Descriptions: After submitting my application, I was contacted nearly immediately to schedule an interview. I met with the manager at the location and answered a series of questions to get a sense of my comfort working with equipment and supporting customers in their projects.
Interview Questions: What piece of equipment are you most comfortable with?

title: Residence Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Champlain College
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very standard for this type of position. Questions were regarding related experience and how I handled certain situations in the past that could come up in this position. My only negative comment on the process was that after the interviews (which seemed very promising) it took 6 months before they finally told me I didn’t get the position (which I had guessed by that point)
Interview Questions: Describe a time when you had to….

title: Admissions Office Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Champlain College
Interview Descriptions: Easy, fun, went smoothly. Was a quick virtual call and I got a quick offer. Worked while still a student, and had a lot of fun. Super nice people and super easy interview and super fun job.
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in this position?

title: Project Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Champlain College (Burlington, VT) in Jul 2021
Interview Descriptions: Respectful & prompt. They we were up front about salary and benefits. They were respectful of my availability and time. They gave my questions to think about ahead of time so I could put my best foot forward. Overall best experience I've ever had interviewing.
Interview Questions: What are some areas you would like to grow in through this job?

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Champlain College (Burlington, VT) in Jun 2021
Interview Descriptions: It was a simple interview process for student internships. They asked me to describe projects I had worked on in class and asked me some behavioral questions. It was a quick turnaround for decisions.
Interview Questions: Describe a project you worked on in class.

title: Programmer Interview
Interview Descriptions: Had a virtual interview at the EMC for a programming position, it was very calm and I enjoyed it. They seemed interested in responses and it felt more personal than other interviews I have had
Interview Questions: They asked about past projects and what I am comfortable doing now

title: Help Desk Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Champlain College
Interview Descriptions: Very straightforward, they asked about previous experience and current studies. One meeting with the Help Desk supervisor and that is it. I Heard back within the week about the decision.
Interview Questions: What technical skills do you have pertinent to IT?

title: Visiting Assistant Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Champlain College (Burlington, VT) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: Campus visit in Burlington Vermont including teaching demonstration and meeting with faculty and students. Campus tour and dinner the night before. Took two days with flight and hotel. Meeting with Dean and provost also.
Interview Questions: Prepare a teaching demonstration. Questions about teaching learning style.

title: Assistant Content Producer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Champlain College
Interview Descriptions:
Spoke to someone from HR on a 10 minute phone call. She gave me a run-down of the position, what they were looking for the role to be, and the benefits. The next week spoke to two people who work closely with this position. They gave me a very different description of what they were looking for. 

I had prepared according to what HR had told me, and tried to talk about those points most in my interview, which the people I interviewed with didn't like. HR and the interviewers seemed to have very, very different views of what this position and the person who fills it should be like.

Overall confusing and rather frustrating experience.
Interview Questions: Are you okay with a cyclical schedule?

title: Administration Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Champlain College
Interview Descriptions: The interview was very relaxed, we went over various positions that i held at the college. We also talked about where i could see the college in the next 20 years and if i could help them in a postive way.

title: Design Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Champlain College (Burlington, VT) in Jan 2012
Interview Descriptions: Very friendly staff here at Champlain College. The interview was a breeze! I was hired on the spot.
